Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters relating to look-at cameras for heads.

lookAtPerf.Wiki: The interpolation performance when LookAt is enabled or disabled. In % per second.

lookAtRateV.Wiki: The vertical correction rate to apply to the target angle.

lookAtRateH.Wiki: The horizontal correction rate to apply to the target angle.

minAngDegV.Wiki: The minimum LookAt angle on the vertical axis.

maxAngDegV.Wiki: The maximum LookAt angle on the vertical axis.

minAngDegH.Wiki: The minimum LookAt angle on the horizontal axis.

maxAngDegH.Wiki: The maximum LookAt angle on the horizontal axis.
